verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w handful|strong="H7062"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* most sweet savour \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w remnant|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w*, \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w holies|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou offerest \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w baked|strong="H3989"\w* \w in|strong="H4503"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w oven|strong="H8574"\w* \w of|strong="H4503"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, \w to|strong="H7126"\w* wit, \w loaves|strong="H2471"\w* without leaven, tempered \w with|strong="H4886"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w wafers|strong="H7550"\w*, \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w with|strong="H4886"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thy oblation \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fryingpan, \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* without leaven,

Thou shalt divide \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* little \w pieces|strong="H6595"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* shalt \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w be|strong="H8081"\w* \w from|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* gridiron, \w in|strong="H4503"\w* like manner \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* shall \w be|strong="H8081"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H8081"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* thou offerest \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou shalt deliver \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hands \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H7311"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* sweet savour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* whatsoever \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w*, \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w holies|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* oblation \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* only \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gifts: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* savour \w of|strong="H3068"\w* sweetness,

\w Whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* thou offerest, thou shalt season \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou take \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy oblations thou shalt \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w gift|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy corn \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ears|strong="H3759"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* green, thou shalt dry \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* break \w it|strong="H0518"\w* small \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w meal|strong="H4503"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H7126"\w* shalt thou \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* thy firstfruits \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

Pouring \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w putting|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord.

Whereof \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gift|strong="H0801"\w*, \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* corn broken small \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*.
